name: KarmaCRM
tag_list: crm, customer, relationship, management, customer-relationship-management, free, software, system, online, web-based, sales, leads, tracking, reports
overview:
KarmaCRM is a web based CRM system that will help you manage all your sales leads and contacts.

KarmaCRM is a powerful, yet simple to use, CRM system targeted at small businesses. It will help any business to streamline their customer relations, sales, marketing and billing processes. A web based CRM system allows your staff to retrieve client files in real time from any internet source. The information they see can be as specific or general as possible, depending on their specific needs at the time of the search.

The CRM software gives your front office staff the ability to track the results of recent marketing campaigns in relation to your existing customers, as well as potential clients and targets. By noting which of your marketing efforts is most successful, you can reduce your overall marketing costs, thus further decreasing overhead.

The business can create better sales outreach efforts by the sales team based on the assessment of past sales and marketing campaigns. Reduce time wasted on more difficult sales and increase your target market based on the results of your research for a higher sales success rate.

The powerful reporting tools available within the system will save time, improve sales efforts and help to build your company’s profits steadily over time.
